title: WTT T205 Ty Cobb for 1954 Topps Hank Aaron RC or ?
author: GehrigFan

posts.post_title: WTT T205 Ty Cobb for 1954 Topps Hank Aaron RC or ?
posts.post_content:
I have a T205 Cobb (PSA Authentic) I would like to trade for a decent 1954 Topps Hank Aaron RC for my set. I will consider other trades also for pre-war big name HOFers (Ruth, Gehrig, Cobb, Mathewson, Johnson, Young, etc.) from any set.

The Cobb presents well. The reason for the Auth-Altered grade is the back has a glue residue on it. I believe the glue was just used to affix it to a scrapbook at one time.
